p: Glutathione-capped Ag 2S nanoclusters showed strong antiviral activity against PEDV used as a model of coronavirus and pronounced reduction of the infection of PEDV by about three orders of magnitude at the noncytotoxic concentration at 12Â h post-infection was observed. The Ag 2S nanoclusters inhibited the synthesis of viral negative-strand RNA and viral budding and positively regulated the generation of interferon-stimulating genes and the expression of proinflammation cytokines (Du et al. 2018).
